title: BRIEF-Cresco Labs Enters Into Sale-And-Leaseback Agreement With Innovative Industrial Properties For Illinois Facilities
text:
BRIEF-Cresco Labs Enters Into Sale-And-Leaseback Agreement With Innovative Industrial Properties For Illinois Facilities

Stock Markets 14 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 07:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Cresco Labs Enters Into Sale-And-Leaseback Agreement With Innovative Industrial Properties For Illinois Facilities Sept 27 (Reuters) - Cresco Labs Inc : * CRESCO LABS ENTERS INTO SALE-AND-LEASEBACK AGREEMENT WITH INNOVATIVE INDUSTRIAL PROPERTIES FOR ILLINOIS FACILITIES * CRESCO LABS - SIGNED BINDING AGREEMENT TO SELL JOLIET & KANKAKEE, ILLINOIS PROPERTIES TO INNOVATIVE INDUSTRIAL PROPERTIES, INC. FOR ABOUT $46.3 MILLION * CRESCO LABS- CONCURRENT WITH CLOSING OF SALE, CO WILL ENTER INTO LONG-TERM, TRIPLE-NET LEASE AGREEMENT WITH IIP

BRIEF-Cresco Labs Enters Into Sale-And-Leaseback Agreement With Innovative Industrial Properties For Illinois Facilities
